# Data reading

```{r}
nodes <- read_csv("data/processed/nodes.csv", col_types = "ccccdccccd")
glimpse(nodes)
```

```{r}
edges <- read_csv("data/processed/edges.csv", col_types = "ccd")
glimpse(edges)
```

```{r}
villages_coord_raw <- st_read("data/raw/villages-original.gpkg")

villages_coord <- villages_coord_raw %>% 
  mutate(lon = st_coordinates(.)[,1], lat = st_coordinates(.)[,2]) %>% 
  st_drop_geometry() %>% 
  select(village_id = id_loc, lon, lat)

nodes_coord <- nodes %>% 
  left_join(villages_coord, by = "village_id")
```

```{r}
networks_raw <- nodes_coord %>% 
  nest(nodes = -hydro_name_ana) %>% 
  mutate(ids = map(nodes, ~ pull(.x, 4))) %>% 
  mutate(edges = map(ids, ~ filter(edges, from %in% .x, to %in% .x))) %>% 
  mutate(size = map(edges, ~ dim(.x)[1])) %>% 
  unnest(size)
```

```{r}
networks_raw
```

```{r}
networks <- networks_raw %>% 
  select(-ids) %>% 
  filter(size > 2) %>% 
  mutate(
    networks = map2(
      nodes, edges, 
      ~ tbl_graph(
        directed = FALSE, node_key = "village_id", nodes = .x, edges = .y
      )
    )
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    order = map(networks, ~ igraph::gorder(.x)),
    edge_density = map(networks, ~ igraph::edge_density(.x))
  ) %>% 
  unnest(c(order, edge_density))
```

```{r}
networks
```

```{r}
actual_edges <- networks %>% 
  select(hydro_name_ana, edges) %>% 
  unnest(edges)
```

```{r}
actual_nodes_id <- unique(c(actual_edges$from, actual_edges$to))
actual_nodes <- filter(nodes, village_id %in% actual_nodes_id)
```

```{r warning=FALSE}
centralities <- networks %>% 
  mutate(centralities = map(networks, get_centralities))
```

# Flow maps

```{r}
g <- centralities$centralities[[5]]
```

```{r}
g %>% 
  ggraph(layout = "linear", circular = TRUE) +
  geom_edge_arc(aes(alpha = d_inv)) + 
  geom_node_point(aes(size = population))
```

```{r}
g %>% 
  ggraph(layout = "circle") +
  geom_edge_fan(aes(alpha = d_inv)) + 
  geom_node_point(aes(size = population))
```

```{r}
coord <- g %>% 
  activate(nodes) %>% 
  select(x = lon, y = lat) %>% 
  as_tibble()
```


```{r}
layout <- create_layout(g, layout = coord)
```

```{r}
g %>% 
  ggraph(graph = layout) +
  geom_edge_arc(aes(alpha = rescale(d_inv, to = c(0.1, 0.5))), strength = 0.1) + 
  geom_node_point(aes(size = population)) +
  scale_alpha_manual(range = c(0.1, 0.5))
```

```{r}
g %>% 
  ggraph(graph = layout) +
  geom_edge_arc(aes(alpha = d_inv), strength = 0.1) + 
  geom_node_point(aes(size = population))
```

```{r}
alpha_values <- g %>% 
  activate(edges) %>% 
  pull(d_inv) %>% 
  rescale(to = c(0.1, 0.7))
```


```{r}
g %>% 
  ggraph(graph = layout) +
  geom_edge_arc(aes(alpha = d_inv), strength = 0.1) + 
  geom_node_point(aes(size = population)) +
  scale_edge_alpha(range = c(0.02, 0.05))
```
